{{WikiProject Germany|class=B|b1=y|b2=y|b3=y|b4=y|b5=y|importance=mid}} {{MILHIST|class=B|b1=y|b2=y|b3=y|b4=y|b5=y|British=y|French=y|German=y|WWI=y }} {{oldpeerreview|archive=1}}
='''Stuff To Do:'''=
Here is a list of stuff we need to do to improve the article to FA status(for anyone who is reading);
Add little sub headings, like Battle of the Marne, Le Cateau etc etc...
Expand most of the article to lengthen it out.
Get stats, numbers of dead etc.
Is there any way we can brighten up the pic of british dead?
I know for a fact people got medals for their actions during this stage in the war, we should put something on that.
We should write about the previous & next stages of the war (I think it was battles of the frontiers before the Great Retreat & after it I think it was the race to the sea?)
Basically writing about anything, even Maubeuge.
Any questions or suggestions contact me or [[User:R.D.H. (Ghost In The Machine)|R.D.H. (Ghost In The Machine)]].
[[User:Spawn Man|Spawn Man]] 08:27, 26 September 2005 (UTC)
== 0.5 nom ==
This article was nominated for [[Wikipedia:Version 0.5]] I failed this article because it's too short, and it has no references. Thanks [[User:Jaranda|Jaranda]] [[User_talk:Jaranda|<sup>wat's sup</sup>]] 06:15, 6 June 2006 (UTC)
:Added some material from GOH 1914 I and pasted some detail from newer pages, added references. Plenty more to do, particularly the backround, Prelude and Aftermath sections.[[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 16:13, 8 March 2014 (UTC)
: Action of Ã‰louges, 24 August : Rearguard Action of Solesmes, 25 August : Affair of Landrecies, 25 August
== Needs ==
The article is short of an analysis section to put the retreat into context, more on the French as it's still Anglocentric and the number data to be added.[[User:Keith-264|Keith-264]] ([[User talk:Keith-264|talk]]) 06:38, 6 September 2014 (UTC)
